parameterDecorators.name: data
parameterDecorators.description: Usually abi encoded, implementation specific data that contains information and arguments to & about the oracle. For example: (string memory collateralSymbol, string memory assetSymbol, uint256 division) = abi.decode(data, (string, string, uint256));.

returnDecorators.description: if no valid (recent) rate is available, return false else true.
The rate of the requested asset / pair / pool.

functionDecorators.name: name
functionDecorators.description: Returns a human readable name about this oracle.

parameterDecorators.name: data
parameterDecorators.description: Usually abi encoded, implementation specific data that contains information and arguments to & about the oracle. For example: (string memory collateralSymbol, string memory assetSymbol, uint256 division) = abi.decode(data, (string, string, uint256));.

returnDecorators.description: (string) A human readable name about this oracle.

functionDecorators.name: peek
functionDecorators.description: Check the last exchange rate without any state changes.

parameterDecorators.name: data
parameterDecorators.description: Usually abi encoded, implementation specific data that contains information and arguments to & about the oracle. For example: (string memory collateralSymbol, string memory assetSymbol, uint256 division) = abi.decode(data, (string, string, uint256));.

returnDecorators.description: if no valid (recent) rate is available, return false else true.
The rate of the requested asset / pair / pool.

functionDecorators.name: peekSpot
functionDecorators.description: Check the current spot exchange rate without any state changes. For oracles like TWAP this will be different from peek().

parameterDecorators.name: data
parameterDecorators.description: Usually abi encoded, implementation specific data that contains information and arguments to & about the oracle. For example: (string memory collateralSymbol, string memory assetSymbol, uint256 division) = abi.decode(data, (string, string, uint256));.

returnDecorators.name: rate
returnDecorators.description: The rate of the requested asset / pair / pool.

functionDecorators.name: symbol
functionDecorators.description: Returns a human readable (short) name about this oracle.

parameterDecorators.name: data
parameterDecorators.description: Usually abi encoded, implementation specific data that contains information and arguments to & about the oracle. For example: (string memory collateralSymbol, string memory assetSymbol, uint256 division) = abi.decode(data, (string, string, uint256));.

returnDecorators.description: (string) A human readable symbol name about this oracle.
